product_overview: A high-performance personal portfolio built with Next.js that showcases projects, experience, and contact functionality with polished animations and smooth scrolling. The site highlights automation and data-science capabilities while providing an easy contact path (Google Sheets + email) for recruiters and clients.
core_goals: Showcase projects, skills, and experience with modern UI/UX and animations
Provide a reliable contact path that logs submissions to Google Sheets and sends email notifications
Deliver a high-performance, responsive Next.js portfolio optimized for recruiters and technical leads
Demonstrate frontend engineering capabilities through smooth scrolling, animated components, and interactive project previews

features.name: Hero Section
features.description: Animated landing section with headline, typewriter subtitle, and CTAs to guide visitors to projects or resume download.
user_flows: Navigate to / -> View animated hero text on page load -> Click View Projects CTA -> Scroll to Projects section -> See Projects section in view
Navigate to / -> View animated hero text on page load -> Click Download Resume button -> Browser downloads resume file or opens resume link
Navigate to / -> View animated hero text on page load -> Click Download Resume button -> Download or link fails -> See no download or visible error

features.name: Navigation Bar
features.description: Sticky navbar with links to page sections and scroll-based active highlighting to indicate the current section.
user_flows: Navigate to / -> Click Projects link in navbar -> Page scrolls to Projects section -> See Projects link highlighted in navbar
Navigate to / -> Click About link in navbar -> Page scrolls to About section -> See About link highlighted in navbar
Navigate to / -> Click a navbar link -> Scrolling does not occur (JS or scroll behavior disabled) -> See no active section highlighted

features.name: About Section
features.description: Bento grid layout presenting bio, animated counters, text reveal animations, and interactive skill/spotlight cards.
user_flows: Navigate to / -> Scroll to About section -> Text reveal animations trigger as section enters viewport -> Animated counters increment to final values
Navigate to / -> Scroll to About section -> Hover over a spotlight card -> See interactive hover effect on the spotlight card
Navigate to / -> Scroll to About section -> Text reveal and counters fail to animate (reduced motion or script failure) -> See static text and counters

features.name: Experience Section
features.description: Scroll-triggered timeline showing work experience entries with reveal animations.
user_flows: Navigate to / -> Scroll to Experience section -> See timeline entries reveal with scroll-triggered animations
Navigate to / -> Slowly scroll through Experience section -> Each timeline entry animates into view sequentially -> See full experience timeline
Navigate to / -> Scroll to Experience section -> Animations do not trigger -> See static timeline entries

features.name: Projects Section
features.description: Horizontal-scrolling project showcase with 3D tilt, video previews on hover, and links to external project sites.
user_flows: Navigate to / -> Scroll vertically to trigger horizontal project card movement -> Hover over a project card -> See video preview play and 3D tilt effect
Navigate to / -> Scroll vertically to trigger horizontal project card movement -> Click Visit Website link on a project card -> Open project in a new browser tab
Navigate to / -> Scroll vertically to trigger horizontal project card movement -> Hover over a project card -> Video preview fails to load or play -> See fallback static thumbnail
Navigate to / -> Scroll vertically to trigger horizontal project card movement -> Click Visit Website link on a project card -> New tab opens to a broken or 404 page -> See error in new tab

features.name: Contact Form
features.description: Contact form on the page that posts submissions to /api/contact which stores data in Google Sheets and triggers email notifications.
user_flows: Navigate to / -> Scroll to Contact section -> Fill in Name input field -> Fill in Email input field -> Fill in Message textarea -> Click Send Message button to submit -> POST /api/contact -> Receive success response -> See success alert

Navigate to / -> Scroll to Contact section -> Fill in Name input field -> Fill in Email input field -> Fill in Message textarea -> Click Send Message button to submit -> POST /api/contact -> Receive error or network failure -> See error alert
Navigate to / -> Scroll to Contact section -> Click Copy Email button -> Email address copied to clipboard -> See confirmation (clipboard success)

features.name: Custom Cursor
features.description: Site-wide custom animated cursor that follows the mouse with spring physics and changes on hover over interactive elements.
user_flows: Navigate to / -> Move mouse around the page -> See custom cursor follow pointer with spring physics
Navigate to / -> Hover over an interactive element (link or button) -> See custom cursor change state to indicate interactivity
Navigate to / -> Move mouse around the page -> Custom cursor fails to appear (CSS or JS issue) -> Default system cursor remains visible
